title: Ep. 804 - The Perpetual Revolution
description:
Cubans take to the streets to protest communism, Hunter Biden sells his doodles for $500K, and a public health expert promises to make life “hard” for the unvaccinated.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
